Posts.Content: I like to see posts with examples of clever comebacks. Whenever I remind someone about my poor memory, I'm reminded that at our age this is "normal." I read a comeback: so has your brain been fried by radiation too? of something like that. Of course I can't remember exactly. :-)
Posts.Title: What not to say to a cancer patient

Posts.Content: Has anyone else developed what I refer to as my "black" sense of humor? I tell people I must be a celebrity: divorced 3x and driven around by others (I am not allowed to drive). My sister laughed and noted that I have a "celebrity cancer' - GBM (Beau Biden; Ted Kennedy). I deallt with infertility many years ago, and would tell people that in my previous life I had 10 children and no husband, so in this life I was going for 10 husbands. (Eliminated many "dates.") :-)
Posts.Title: What not to say to a cancer patient
